extends java.lang.Object

      Adds module dependencies on this builder without mentioning scope.
      JkDependencies.Builder resetDefaultScope()
      After this declaration, dependencies declared without scope won't be set with any scope or scope mapping.

      After this declaration, dependencies declared without scope will be set with the specified scope mapping.

      After this declaration, dependencies declared without scope will be set with the specified scopes.

      • usingDefaultScopes

        public JkDependencies.Builder usingDefaultScopes(JkScope... scopes)

        After this declaration, dependencies declared without scope will be set with the specified scope mapping.

      • on

        public JkDependencies.Builder on(JkProcess jkProcess,
                                 java.io.File file,
                                 JkScope... scopes)
        Adds the specified computed dependency to this builder. If the specified file is not present then the specified process is launched prior to try to get the file again.
